svcsubproc.title: Under Body Compartments
svcsubproc.para: The luggage boxes or underbody compartments are located along the lower line of the body and attached to the floor structure flange sections. The front face of the compartment door frame is on the side sheet and attached with mounting screws ( Fig. 27, Item 2). The luggage compartment has luggage box hanger brackets attached to the rear of the compartment upper surface with a "J" clip assembly clipped to the frame rail upper flange. The luggage box mounting brackets are welded to the rear wall of the luggage compartment. The upper flanges of the luggage compartment are spot welded to the floor structure lower flange. The number of luggage box mounting brackets may vary depending on the overall length of the compartment.

step1.para: To remove the under body storage / luggage box compartment, place jack stand supports under the compartment in preparation for compartment removal.
Prior to removing the underbody luggage compartment the compartment door may be removed. (See steps 11-14)
With a grinder carefully grind the spot welds at the compartment top flanges and floor structure lower flange.
With all the welds removed check the floor structure flange for undercoating or other debris. Make sure the flange surface is clean and smooth.
Locate the mounting screws along the face frame of the compartment door.
Loosen and remove the mounting screws.
Remove the front face plate of the luggage compartment.

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. TOP OF FRAME RAIL (DRIVERS SIDE SHOWN)

step1.para: Locate the luggage box hanger brackets and "J" clip mounting bolts and nuts at the rear of the compartment.
Loosen and remove the luggage box "J" clip attachment mounting nuts and bolts.
With an assistant lower the compartment support jack stands and remove compartment from bus body.

svcsubproc.para: The under body luggage compartment door can be removed without removal of the entire under body compartment. The under body compartment door hinge is a single piece extruded rubber hinge that runs the full length of the door opening.

step1.para: To remove the underbody compartment door, unlatch the door lock mechanism and swing door upward.
With an assistant, slide the door assembly from rubber extruded door hinge. Remove the door when the hinge and the door have been disconnected.
The hinge may then also be removed from the compartment frame extrusion by sliding the hinge out of the extrusion.

figure.caption: Figure 123. Under Body Compartment Hinge Assembly

step1.para: Check the rubber extruded door hinge for cracks or breaks and replace if necessary.
